trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.resname: PH18·1 | Kharis & The Beholder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Human creature token and make a charisma check. (Roll a d20.)
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Human creature token and make a charisma check. (Roll a d20.)

trans-unit.resname: PH18·1 | Kharis & The Beholder | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • If the result plus the number of creatures you control is greater than 11, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: • If the result plus the number of creatures you control is greater than 11, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

trans-unit.resname: PH18·1 | Kharis & The Beholder | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • If the result is a natural 20, for each nonlegendary creature you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
trans-unit.target: • If the result is a natural 20, for each nonlegendary creature you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

trans-unit.resname: PH18·4 | The Legend of Arena | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Legend of Arena
trans-unit.target: The Legend of Arena

trans-unit.resname: PH18·4 | The Legend of Arena | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME can be your commander.

trans-unit.resname: PH18·4 | The Legend of Arena | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: I, II — Create a 2/1 red Human Wizard creature token. Spells you cast this turn cost {1} less to cast for each Wizard you control.
trans-unit.target: I, II — Create a 2/1 red Human Wizard creature token. Spells you cast this turn cost {1} less to cast for each Wizard you control.

trans-unit.resname: PH18·4 | The Legend of Arena | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: III — Search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. It enters with an additional loyalty counter on it for each Wizard you control.
trans-unit.target: III — Search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. It enters with an additional loyalty counter on it for each Wizard you control.
